# Overview 
:::

The Plant Dairy Producer (PDP) Survey captures benchmark data from the plant-based dairy sector. It includes both B2C and B2B producers with distribution in supermarkets and foodservice.

Each quarter, the survey delivers valuable insights into the industryâ€™s status and outlook, providing essential information for policymakers, investors, and other stakeholders. For companies operating in the plant-based dairy sector, this survey is an indispensable tool offering empirical guidance for strategic business planning.

This survey is made possible through funding from the European Union's [HORIZON EUROPE](https://research-and-innovation.ec.europa.eu/funding/funding-opportunities/funding-programmes-and-open-calls/horizon-europe_en) research and innovation programme under grant agreement [No 101059632](https://ec.europa.eu/info/funding-tenders/opportunities/portal/screen/opportunities/projects-details/43108390/101059632/HORIZON).
